items.name: file-errors
items.title: File Errors
items.description: Error handler component that displays errors as toast notifications using sonner.
items.docs:
This component displays errors as toast notifications using sonner.

Usage:
```tsx
// Basic usage
<FileErrors />

// With custom position and duration
<FileErrors position="top-center" duration={3000} />
```

**Important**: You must have a `<Toaster />` component from sonner in your app for toasts to appear:
```tsx
import { Toaster } from 'sonner';

// In your app root
<Toaster position="bottom-right" richColors />
```
